{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3432636,"name":"Raiden Snelson","username":"TheSavageDemon","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thesavagedemon/{size}/243298_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-09T01:27:26.456Z","cooked":"

Does anybody have any idea what the syntax would be to write a function for setting the limelight’s priorityid in Python? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-10-09T01:27:26.456Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":50,"readers_count":49,"score":55.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":472645,"topic_slug":"limelight-priorityid-syntax-python","display_username":"Raiden Snelson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":68366,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/limelight-priorityid-syntax-python/472645/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3432647,"name":"Liam","username":"RadiOA","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/b5ac83/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-10-09T02:09:14.770Z","cooked":"

I haven’t used Python for FRC before, but I’m familiar with the Java API, so I may be taking the wrong approach here. It looks like there is a library for this in Java, but not Python. You can still use the NetworkTables API though. To get data in Python, you can use the following:

NetworkTables.getTable("limelight").getNumber('<variablename>')

Conversely, to retrieve data you can use the following:

NetworkTables.getTable("limelight").putNumber('<variablename>',<value>)

To set the priorityid, you should be able to use something like this:

priorityid_to_set = 7
NetworkTables.getTable("limelight").putNumber('priorityid',priorityid_to_set )

I hope I’m not misleading you, good luck.
